data.title: Great meeting place.
data.text: This is a quaint bar and restaurant right on Main Street. People meet there for conversation and an evening with friends. Nice place to go just to relax and catch up on your friends lives over the years.

data.title: our favorite place to eat & drink!!!
data.text: have never had a bad meal there.  specials every night on food and beverages.  my fave is Thursday nite, half price wine and half price chicken wings!  bonus is the awesome bartenders who treat you like your something special when you walk in, Nicole, Kendra & Aaron!!  plus Matt the owner isn't too shabby himself!! they also have a courtyard out back to hang out when the weather is nice!

data.title: Will always go back.
data.text: Matts is a nice downtown pub.  Eclectic, bathtub in the dining area.  Matt is a great guy.  He makes you feel right ay home.  Definitely will return!

data.title: Small party place
data.text: Had a recent work party there. Not much to say Upstairs is long  and ok for a small group...say under 50. Another average bar....poor parking.

data.title: Excellent Italian food and nice atmosphere.
data.text: Matt's is located in downtown Kenosha, and offers a wide variety of Italian Food. We went with the wings, meatball bomber, and stuffed pizza. Everything was great, especially the stuffed pizza.  They offer a wide variety of beer, wine, and liqueur - along with a friendly environment and the wait staff and bartenders were awesome.  Highly recommend.
